nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 95, with temperatures falling to around 90 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 105. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
